3: You're a Corrupted!
Urgh!!!
And you're a Corrupted!
What's with that Construct...?
I think I saw her on the files before! Are reinforcements coming?!
Oh! Then we should get ready for a counterattack, yeah?
NO! Nanami isn't here to help you fight the bionics!
What?!
Answering the Construct, Nanami dashes into the fray, defeating every Corrupted that she sees.
All that stands in Nanami's way is met with a whack of her chainsaw and sent flying afar. Nobody can handle the Nanami calamity.
Oi, Simon, what's with this Construct lass?! Why is she attacking our people?!
I think I saw her with Boss before... Some Construct called Nanami.
I don't need her name! I need a way to deal with that Construct!
I'm afraid only our very-not-present Boss can handle her.
Soldiers on the frontline, do you copy? Pull back immediately! Don't engage with the Construct that just rushed in.
What?! What about our defenses?!
It'll just be one or two openings. We'll be fine. Getting out of her way is more important.
We'll cover for the openings.
Diana... Why are the Forest Guard here? Did you capture that Atiel?
【kuroname】 and Rosetta will handle Atiel. We've returned to support the frontline instead. Forest Guards, spread out!
At Diana's behest, the Forest Guard members charge at the battlefield. Taking care to stay out of Nanami's way, they rescue the incapacitated ARU members.
Pah, took your damn sweet time... some Forest 'Guards' you all are!
But it's still not too late, is it not?
...Whaddya mean?
Your leg's hurt. Ride on my teammate's back and retreat. We'll handle the rest from here on out.
Ya think we can leave our defenses to you sinners? You...
Even if we're sinners... We're sinners born and raised here. Please believe in us.
Nanami, at this rate, you'll leave the battlefield. Aren't you trying to pluck all the Corrupted out?
Well, I'm catching the trails of someone that's tryna sneak away!
What?
Dunno what that is, but that must be the source of all evil! The stinky sneaky baddie that's controlling the Corrupted and making a mess!
Martin, you'll have to handle the Corrupted! Nanami is going to...
Nanami lowers her stance mid-dash, bending so low as if she is about to fall. The angles of her booster wheels adjust and maintain her balance, allowing Nanami to slide forward at full speed.
...Be the hero!
